translations.settings.local_cache.title: Local cache
translations.settings.local_cache.description: Most data is saved locally on your device. If you experience problems, try deleting all local data. Depending on the amount of available data on the server, it can take some time before all data is available again.
translations.home.title: Home
translations.explore.title: Explore
translations.notification.login.title: You are missing out!
translations.notification.login.message: Click here to create an account or log in
translations.notification.offline.title: You are offline.
translations.notification.offline.message: You can still use the app and browse through offline content, but some content (like videos) might not be available.
translations.notification.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
translations.notification.privacy_policy.message: Click here to accept our privacy policy for a fully featured app experience.
translations.notification.clearCache_offline.title: Can't clear local cache
translations.notification.clearCache_offline.descript: You are offline, new data can't be loaded. Wait until you are online.
translations.notification.clearCache_success.title: Local cache cleared
translations.notification.clearCache_success.descript: New data is loading from the server, it might take a minute.
translations.privacy_policy.modal.title: Privacy Policy
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message: By using this app, you agree to our privacy policy.
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message_map.accepte: You have already accepted the privacy policy.
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message_map.decline: You have previously declined the privacy policy. Please accept it for a fully featured app experience.
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message_map.outdate: We have updated our privacy policy. Please accept it for a fully featured app experience.
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message_map.unaccep: Please accept our privacy policy for a fully featured app experience.
translations.privacy_policy.banner.message_map.outdat: We have updated our privacy policy. Click here to accept it for a fully featured app experience.
translations.privacy_policy.banner.message_map.unacce: Click here to accept our privacy policy for a fully featured app experience.
translations.privacy_policy.banner.title: Privacy Policy
translations.privacy_policy.modal.message_link: Click {link} to read our privacy policy.
translations.select_theme.title: Select theme
translations.bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
translations.bookmarks.empty_page: You should try this! Click on this icon on any post to bookmark it.
